solution_line_template: When all levels are empty, each level can fit {total_capacity} / {num_levels} = <<{total_capacity}/{num_levels}={capacity_per_level}>>{capacity_per_level} cars.

When there are already {parked_cars} parked cars on a level, there is still a place for {capacity_per_level} - {parked_cars} = <<{capacity_per_level}-{parked_cars}={remaining_capacity}>>{remaining_capacity} cars.
